intro: Train, Care, and Play – Build the Ultimate Puppy Academy!
description:
• Care for puppies of all breeds and teach them fun tricks.
• Keep your pups happy, wash, feed, and entertain them with a variety of toys.
• Take your puppies on walks through a beautiful park full of surprises and activities.
• Expand your academy with new kennels, toys, and upgraded training spaces.

Welcome to Cute Puppy Academy, the ultimate destination for puppy lovers and aspiring trainers! Your dream of creating a haven for adorable puppies has finally come true. Take in a variety of playful pups, each with their own unique personality, and embark on an exciting journey of care, training, and companionship.

Feed them, groom them, and teach them tricks that will make their tails wag with joy. Take your puppies on delightful walks through vibrant environment where fun mini-games await, testing their agility, obedience, and your training skills.

As you progress, expand and improve your academy, adding new facilities, equipment, and decorations to make it the perfect space for your furry friends. Build your reputation as the best puppy trainer in town, attract more puppies to your care, and unlock new challenges!
